3. Services Documentation¶

3.1. Base service¶

The L{base_service} module contains classes that form the low level foundations of the Web Service API. Things that many different kinds of requests have in common may be found here. In particular, the L{OWTBaseService} class handles most of the basic, repetetive setup work that most requests do.

class openwastetracelib.base_service.OWTBaseService(config_obj, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: object

This class is the master class for all SISTRI request objects. It gets all of the common SOAP objects created via suds and populates them with values from a L{OWTConfig} object, along with keyword arguments via L{__init__}. @note: This object should never be used directly, use one of the included sub-classes.

config_obj¶

@ivar: The OWTConfig object to pull auth info from.

create_wsdl_object_of_type(type_name)[source]¶

Creates and returns a WSDL object of the specified type.

logger¶

@ivar: Python logger instance with name ‘owt’.

response¶

@ivar: The response from SISTRI. You will want to pick what you want out here here. This object does have a __str__() method, you’ll want to print or log it to see what possible values you can pull.

send_request(send_function=None)[source]¶

Sends the assembled request on the child object. @type send_function: function reference @keyword send_function: A function reference (passed without the parenthesis) to a function that will send the request. This allows for overriding the default function in cases such as validation requests.

exception openwastetracelib.base_service.OWTBaseServiceException(error_code, value)[source]¶

Bases: exceptions.Exception

Exception: Serves as the base exception that other service-related exception objects are sub-classed from.

exception openwastetracelib.base_service.OWTError(error_code, value)[source]¶

Bases: openwastetracelib.base_service.OWTBaseServiceException

Exception: These are generally problems with the client-provided data.

exception openwastetracelib.base_service.OWTFailure(error_code, value)[source]¶

Bases: openwastetracelib.base_service.OWTBaseServiceException

Exception: The request could not be handled at this time. This is generally a server problem.

exception openwastetracelib.base_service.SchemaValidationError[source]¶

Bases: openwastetracelib.base_service.OWTBaseServiceException

Exception: There is probably a problem in the data you provided.

3.2. Services¶

This module contains the wrappers around Sistri Web Service requests which you will want to instantiate and use with a L{OWTConfig} object supplying your static details.

3.2.1. Anagrafiche service¶

This package contains the anagrafiche managment methods defined by Sistri. For more details on each, refer to the respective class’s documentation.

class openwastetracelib.services.anagrafiche_service.GettingAziendaRequest(config_obj, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: openwastetracelib.base_service.OWTBaseService

This class allows you to get an Azienda object. By default, you can simply pass a identity string to the constructor.

class openwastetracelib.services.anagrafiche_service.GettingSedeRequest(config_obj, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: openwastetracelib.base_service.OWTBaseService

This class allows you to get an Sede object. By default, you can simply pass a identity string to the constructor.

exception openwastetracelib.services.anagrafiche_service.OWTInvalidAzienda(error_code, value)[source]¶

Bases: openwastetracelib.base_service.OWTError

Exception: Sent when a an error related invalid Azienda id.

3.2.2. Cataloghi service¶

This package contains the cataloghi managment methods defined by Sistri. For more details on each, refer to the respective class’s documentation.

exception openwastetracelib.services.cataloghi_service.OWTInvalidCataloghi(error_code, value)[source]¶

Bases: openwastetracelib.base_service.OWTError

Exception: Sent when a an error related cataloghi occurred.

class openwastetracelib.services.cataloghi_service.UpdateCataloghiRequest(config_obj, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: openwastetracelib.base_service.OWTBaseService

This class allows you to updating all Cataloghi objects. By default, you can simply pass a identity string to the constructor.

class openwastetracelib.services.cataloghi_service.UpdateDescrittoriCataloghiRequest(config_obj, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: openwastetracelib.base_service.OWTBaseService

This class allows you to updating all DescrittoriCataloghi objects. By default, you can simply pass a identity string to the constructor.
